title: The Shawshank Redemption
directors: Frank Darabont|Stephen King|Tim Robbins|Morgan Freeman|Bob Gunton
stars: Frank Darabont|Stephen King|Tim Robbins|Morgan Freeman|Bob Gunton|William Sadler|Clancy Brown|Gil Bellows
synopsis: A banker convicted of uxoricide forms a friendship over a quarter century with a hardened convict, while maintaining his innocence and trying to remain hopeful through simple compassion.

title: The Godfather
directors: Francis Ford Coppola|Mario Puzo|Marlon Brando|Al Pacino|James Caan
stars: Francis Ford Coppola|Mario Puzo|Marlon Brando|Al Pacino|James Caan|Richard S. Castellano|Robert Duvall|Sterling Hayden
synopsis: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
directors: Christopher Nolan|Jonathan Nolan|David S. Goyer|Christian Bale|Heath Ledger
stars: Christopher Nolan|Jonathan Nolan|David S. Goyer|Christian Bale|Heath Ledger|Aaron Eckhart|Michael Caine|Maggie Gyllenhaal
synopsis: When a menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman, James Gordon and Harvey Dent must work together to put an end to the madness.

title: The Godfather Part II
directors: Francis Ford Coppola|Mario Puzo|Al Pacino|Robert De Niro|Robert Duvall
stars: Francis Ford Coppola|Mario Puzo|Al Pacino|Robert De Niro|Robert Duvall|Diane Keaton|John Cazale|Talia Shire
synopsis: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

title: 12 Angry Men
directors: Sidney Lumet|Reginald Rose|Henry Fonda|Lee J. Cobb|Martin Balsam
stars: Sidney Lumet|Reginald Rose|Henry Fonda|Lee J. Cobb|Martin Balsam|John Fiedler|E.G. Marshall|Jack Klugman
synopsis: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
directors: Peter Jackson|J.R.R. Tolkien|Fran Walsh|Philippa Boyens|Elijah Wood
stars: Peter Jackson|J.R.R. Tolkien|Fran Walsh|Philippa Boyens|Elijah Wood|Viggo Mortensen|Ian McKellen|Noel Appleby
synopsis: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: Schindler's List
directors: Steven Spielberg|Thomas Keneally|Steven Zaillian|Liam Neeson|Ralph Fiennes
stars: Steven Spielberg|Thomas Keneally|Steven Zaillian|Liam Neeson|Ralph Fiennes|Ben Kingsley|Caroline Goodall|Jonathan Sagall
synopsis: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
directors: Peter Jackson|J.R.R. Tolkien|Fran Walsh|Philippa Boyens|Elijah Wood
stars: Peter Jackson|J.R.R. Tolkien|Fran Walsh|Philippa Boyens|Elijah Wood|Ian McKellen|Orlando Bloom|Sean Bean
synopsis: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: Pulp Fiction
directors: Quentin Tarantino|Roger Avary|John Travolta|Uma Thurman|Samuel L. Jackson
stars: Quentin Tarantino|Roger Avary|John Travolta|Uma Thurman|Samuel L. Jackson|Bruce Willis|Tim Roth|Amanda Plummer
synopsis: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
directors: Sergio Leone|Luciano Vincenzoni|Agenore Incrocci|Clint Eastwood|Eli Wallach
stars: Sergio Leone|Luciano Vincenzoni|Agenore Incrocci|Clint Eastwood|Eli Wallach|Lee Van Cleef|Aldo Giuffrè|Luigi Pistilli
synopsis: A bounty-hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

title: Forrest Gump
directors: Robert Zemeckis|Winston Groom|Eric Roth|Tom Hanks|Robin Wright
stars: Robert Zemeckis|Winston Groom|Eric Roth|Tom Hanks|Robin Wright|Gary Sinise|Sally Field|Rebecca Williams
synopsis: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
directors: Peter Jackson|J.R.R. Tolkien|Fran Walsh|Philippa Boyens|Elijah Wood
stars: Peter Jackson|J.R.R. Tolkien|Fran Walsh|Philippa Boyens|Elijah Wood|Ian McKellen|Viggo Mortensen|Orlando Bloom
synopsis: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: Fight Club
directors: David Fincher|Chuck Palahniuk|Jim Uhls|Brad Pitt|Edward Norton
stars: David Fincher|Chuck Palahniuk|Jim Uhls|Brad Pitt|Edward Norton|Meat Loaf|Zach Grenier|Richmond Arquette
synopsis: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

title: Inception
directors: Christopher Nolan|Leonardo DiCaprio|Joseph Gordon-Levitt|Elliot Page
stars: Christopher Nolan|Leonardo DiCaprio|Joseph Gordon-Levitt|Elliot Page|Ken Watanabe|Tom Hardy|Dileep Rao|Cillian Murphy
synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
directors: Irvin Kershner|Leigh Brackett|Lawrence Kasdan|George Lucas|Mark Hamill
stars: Irvin Kershner|Leigh Brackett|Lawrence Kasdan|George Lucas|Mark Hamill|Harrison Ford|Carrie Fisher|Billy Dee Williams
synopsis: After the Empire overpowers the Rebel Alliance, Luke Skywalker begins training with Jedi Master Yoda, while Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett pursue his friends across the galaxy.

title: The Matrix
directors: Lana Wachowski|Lilly Wachowski|Keanu Reeves|Laurence Fishburne|Carrie-Anne Moss
stars: Lana Wachowski|Lilly Wachowski|Keanu Reeves|Laurence Fishburne|Carrie-Anne Moss|Hugo Weaving|Gloria Foster|Joe Pantoliano
synopsis: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

title: Goodfellas
directors: Martin Scorsese|Nicholas Pileggi|Robert De Niro|Ray Liotta|Joe Pesci
stars: Martin Scorsese|Nicholas Pileggi|Robert De Niro|Ray Liotta|Joe Pesci|Lorraine Bracco|Paul Sorvino|Frank Sivero
synopsis: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

title: Interstellar
directors: Christopher Nolan|Jonathan Nolan|Matthew McConaughey|Anne Hathaway|Jessica Chastain
stars: Christopher Nolan|Jonathan Nolan|Matthew McConaughey|Anne Hathaway|Jessica Chastain|Ellen Burstyn|Mackenzie Foy|John Lithgow
synopsis: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
directors: Milos Forman|Lawrence Hauben|Bo Goldman|Ken Kesey|Jack Nicholson
stars: Milos Forman|Lawrence Hauben|Bo Goldman|Ken Kesey|Jack Nicholson|Louise Fletcher|Michael Berryman|Peter Brocco
synopsis: A rebellious convict is sent to a psychiatric hospital for evaluation in 1963 Oregon, and encourages his docile companions to take more control of their lives and defy the tyrannical head nurse.

title: Se7en
directors: David Fincher|Andrew Kevin Walker|Morgan Freeman|Brad Pitt|Kevin Spacey
stars: David Fincher|Andrew Kevin Walker|Morgan Freeman|Brad Pitt|Kevin Spacey|Daniel Zacapa|Gwyneth Paltrow|John Cassini
synopsis: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: It's a Wonderful Life
directors: Frank Capra|Frances Goodrich|Albert Hackett|James Stewart|Donna Reed
stars: Frank Capra|Frances Goodrich|Albert Hackett|James Stewart|Donna Reed|Lionel Barrymore|Thomas Mitchell|Henry Travers
synopsis: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
directors: Jonathan Demme|Thomas Harris|Ted Tally|Jodie Foster|Anthony Hopkins
stars: Jonathan Demme|Thomas Harris|Ted Tally|Jodie Foster|Anthony Hopkins|Scott Glenn|Ted Levine|Anthony Heald
synopsis: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

title: Seven Samurai
directors: Akira Kurosawa|Shinobu Hashimoto|Hideo Oguni|Toshirô Mifune|Takashi Shimura
stars: Akira Kurosawa|Shinobu Hashimoto|Hideo Oguni|Toshirô Mifune|Takashi Shimura|Keiko Tsushima|Yukiko Shimazaki|Kamatari Fujiwara
synopsis: Farmers from a village exploited by bandits hire a veteran samurai for protection, and he gathers six other samurai to join him.

title: Saving Private Ryan
directors: Steven Spielberg|Robert Rodat|Tom Hanks|Matt Damon|Tom Sizemore
stars: Steven Spielberg|Robert Rodat|Tom Hanks|Matt Damon|Tom Sizemore|Edward Burns|Barry Pepper|Adam Goldberg
synopsis: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose comrades have been killed in action.

title: The Green Mile
directors: Frank Darabont|Stephen King|Tom Hanks|Michael Clarke Duncan|David Morse
stars: Frank Darabont|Stephen King|Tom Hanks|Michael Clarke Duncan|David Morse|Bonnie Hunt|James Cromwell|Michael Jeter
synopsis: A death row guard learns that a gentle giant in his charge possesses a mysterious gift.
